messages.subject: Seeking penpal for dd
messages.msgSnippet: After a week and a half of intense searching, I am throwing in the towel and posting here.  My 12almost13yo dd is looking for a snail mail penpal.  Everything
messages.messageBody:
After a week and a half of intense searching, I am throwing in the
towel and posting here. My 12almost13yo dd is looking for a snail mail
penpal. Everything we have so far investigated has a membership fee or
is not snail mail.

If anyone out there has a daughter that may like to write, please email
me. Her interests are building things (with wood,legos, clay, lincoln
logs, etc.), softball, loves music, video games and is an avid Roller
Coaster tycoon player, enjoys sewing, making friends and is the girl
from the well in The Ring for Halloween. If you feel sure about a
connection between my dd and yours, please feel free to email her
directly at lilmissjess_910@...

If anyone has a line on mail penpals or where we could get a catalogue,
please email me.

Thanks,

Sally
